mapper.sql: account_Id, area_code, Lng, lat, shape, point, rlat, rlng, cname, ext1, ext2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from merchant_area
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into merchant_area (account_Id, area_code, Lng, lat, shape, point, rlat, rlng, cname, ext1, ext2) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into merchant_area
account_Id,
area_code,
Lng,
lat,
shape,
point,
rlat,
rlng,
cname,
ext1,
ext2,

mapper.update:
update merchant_area
account_Id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{record.lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shape = #{record.shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{record.point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rlat = #{record.rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rlng = #{record.rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext1 = #{record.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext2 = #{record.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update merchant_area set account_Id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{record.lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shape = #{record.shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, point = #{record.point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rlat = #{record.rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rlng = #{record.rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{record.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{record.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update merchant_area
Lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shape = #{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rlat = #{rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rlng = #{rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where account_Id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update merchant_area set Lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shape = #{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, point = #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rlat = #{rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rlng = #{rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where account_Id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ma.area_code,ma.cname area from merchant_area ma where ma.account_Id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: ma.account_Id, ma.area_code, ma.Lng, ma.lat, ma.shape, ma.point, ma.rlat, ma.rlng
